title: Rasen

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Use any ability with a title at night, like 2017: Vik, Shadowed Seer's Predict Impossiblity or 1196: Delta's Isolate. You may only use each ability once. You may not use abilities that would unconditionally deal attacks or coldsnap.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the game, you may change up to three words anywhere in the Grand Idea Mafia (hell) Comprehensive Rules document to any other word each other than "Discordian(s)" for the duration of the game. Those rules take precedence over any other rules for that game.
- The host may reject your rules changes for any reason. If they do, you may continue to propose new rules changes until they are accepted.
